reviews.text:
Not my first review and I want to add: I STILL LOVE THIS PLACE!! 

For Columbus, this place is now on my top 3 list of places I recommend. That's right no...
Feels like a bar with tables for dining so I didn't feel as comfortable as I like when dining in mid-afternoon.  Plenty of natural light though. The wait...

We had very quick and courteous service. The food came out hot and tasted good. 

The only complaint I could have had was the cheese sticks and walleye had...
